about_the_game:
"WISH -Paradise High- blossom".
The DLC adds five characters who can enjoy different battles from the new script.
Set up the DLC to connect to the last story of "WISH -Paradise High-".

Beautiful female characters with different charms! Feel yourself with Japanese full voice!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
